source: Traditional Chinese Fortune Telling - Guanyin Oracle (觀音靈簽) and Classical Fortune Sticks
description: A collection of 100 fortune readings based on traditional Chinese oracle systems, combining historical references and philosophical wisdom

fortunes.verse:
The sign of heaven and earth opening, all things begin anew.
Auspicious days bring ripened fruits along the way.
Those loyal and virtuous shall rise in status.
Prosperity and joy will accompany the entire journey.

interpretation.general: This is a sign of supreme fortune. All plans will proceed smoothly and successfully.
interpretation.business: New ventures will flourish rapidly, profits await on the horizon.
interpretation.romance: Harmonious relationships bloom, an auspicious time for marriage.
interpretation.health: Excellent health, chronic ailments will heal completely.

fortunes.verse:
Fishing by the Wei River with patience profound.
A wise king recognizes talent without a sound.
Your time has come, no longer wait in vain.
Great opportunities arrive like gentle rain.

interpretation.general: Recognition and reward for your talents are imminent. Patience brings great returns.
interpretation.business: A powerful partnership or mentor will elevate your enterprise.
interpretation.romance: Someone of high caliber appreciates your true worth.
interpretation.health: Recovery is steady, maintain your current regimen.

fortunes.verse:
Filial piety touches the heavens above.
Divine assistance comes wrapped in love.
Debts will be cleared, burdens made light.
Heaven rewards those who do what's right.

interpretation.general: Your sincere efforts will receive unexpected divine assistance.
interpretation.business: Help arrives from unexpected sources, debts can be settled.
interpretation.romance: A destined connection brings happiness beyond measure.
interpretation.health: Miraculous improvement, maintain faith and positive attitude.

fortunes.title_english: Jade Rabbit Gazes at the Moon
fortunes.verse:
The rabbit looks up at the moon so bright.
What it seeks remains just out of sight.
Patience and timing are the keys you need.
Wait for the right moment to proceed.

interpretation.general: Goals are achievable but require perfect timing. Do not rush.
interpretation.business: Opportunities exist but are not yet ripe. Prepare thoroughly.
interpretation.romance: The one you admire notices you, but needs more time.
interpretation.health: Stable condition, avoid excessive strain or stress.

fortunes.verse:
Strategic wisdom commands the very wind.
Impossible tasks bow to a brilliant mind.
When heaven and earth align with your plan.
Victory is certain for the wise man.

interpretation.general: Intelligence and strategy will overcome all obstacles.
interpretation.business: Bold plans succeed through clever execution and timing.
interpretation.romance: Take initiative with confidence, success is assured.
interpretation.health: Strong vitality, your energy overcomes any weakness.

fortunes.verse:
Two birds fight while fisherman stands by.
When others clash, your fortune multiplies.
Remain neutral, watch with patient eyes.
The wise benefit while others struggle and strive.

interpretation.general: Stay neutral in conflicts, opportunities arise from others' disputes.
interpretation.business: Profit from market disruptions, but avoid taking sides.
interpretation.romance: Do not involve yourself in love triangles, wait patiently.
interpretation.health: Avoid stress from others' problems, maintain peace.

fortunes.title_english: Su Qin Becomes Prime Minister of Six States
fortunes.verse:
Eloquence and wisdom open every door.
Six kingdoms bow to diplomatic lore.
Your talents shine in negotiation's art.
Success beyond your dreams is set to start.

interpretation.general: Multiple opportunities for advancement present themselves simultaneously.
interpretation.business: Expand boldly, multiple ventures all prove successful.
interpretation.romance: Many admirers surround you, choose wisely.
interpretation.health: Excellent vitality, your energy inspires others.

fortunes.verse:
Each uses their unique skill to cross.
Diversity in methods brings no loss.
Your special talent is the key.
Success comes through being truly free.

interpretation.general: Trust your unique abilities, unconventional methods work best.
interpretation.business: Innovation and creativity lead to breakthrough success.
interpretation.romance: Be yourself authentically, the right person will appreciate you.
interpretation.health: Alternative or personalized approaches to wellness succeed.

fortunes.title_english: Diligent Study in the Cold Window
fortunes.verse:
Years of effort in the lamp's dim light.
Hardship endured through every night.
Perseverance brings the golden day.
Success rewards those who stay the way.

interpretation.general: Continued effort is required, but success is guaranteed eventually.
interpretation.business: Long-term investments pay off, maintain discipline.
interpretation.romance: Relationship requires work but becomes deeply rewarding.
interpretation.health: Gradual improvement through consistent healthy habits.

fortunes.verse:
After winter's harsh and bitter cold.
The plum blooms twice, a sight to behold.
Second chances bring renewed delight.
What was lost returns in fuller might.

interpretation.general: A second opportunity brings even greater success than the first.
interpretation.business: Retry previous ventures with new wisdom, success follows.
interpretation.romance: Rekindled relationships or second love brings happiness.
interpretation.health: Recovery and renewed vitality after a difficult period.

fortunes.verse:
Sitting idly waiting for luck to strike.
Once fortune smiled, but lightning hits not twice alike.
Active effort is what you must employ.
Passive waiting brings no lasting joy.

interpretation.general: Past luck cannot be repeated. Take active measures now.
interpretation.business: Old methods no longer work, innovate or stagnate.
interpretation.romance: Waiting passively will not bring love, take initiative.
interpretation.health: Cannot rely on natural healing alone, seek active treatment.

fortunes.verse:
A mighty dragon trapped in shallow pool.
Great talent hindered, unable to rule.
Wait for the tide to rise once more.
Then soar to heights as you did before.

interpretation.general: Temporary setback for capable person. Maintain dignity and wait.
interpretation.business: Current environment limits your potential, consider relocation.
interpretation.romance: Your worth is not recognized now, but will be soon.
interpretation.health: Feel restricted or stifled, seek change of environment.

fortunes.verse:
When fortune reaches its lowest ebb.
The tide must turn as fate has said.
Darkest hour before the dawn appears.
Persevere through these final tears.

interpretation.general: Difficulties are ending, better times approach rapidly.
interpretation.business: Worst is over, recovery and growth begin soon.
interpretation.romance: Relationship troubles resolve, harmony returns.
interpretation.health: Turning point in illness, recovery begins now.

fortunes.title_english: Zhang Liang Meets the Yellow Stone Elder
fortunes.verse:
Humble service to mysterious sage.
Patience rewarded at proper age.
Secret wisdom passed to worthy one.
Great destiny has just begun.

interpretation.general: A wise mentor or teaching transforms your path completely.
interpretation.business: Valuable guidance leads to strategic advantage.
interpretation.romance: Elder's advice or introduction leads to good match.
interpretation.health: Alternative wisdom or ancient remedy brings healing.

fortunes.verse:
Against the current, swimming with might.
Leaping high through the narrow gate so tight.
Transformation complete, dragon you become.
Glorious success has finally come.

interpretation.general: Major breakthrough and transformation brings elevation in status.
interpretation.business: Massive success through perseverance against odds.
interpretation.romance: Relationship transcends to new level of commitment.
interpretation.health: Complete recovery and vitality beyond previous state.

fortunes.verse:
Hidden treasure long buried deep.
Now surfaces from earthly keep.
Your true value will be revealed.
Recognition and reward are sealed.

interpretation.general: Hidden talents or assets finally receive proper recognition.
interpretation.business: Undervalued venture suddenly gains attention and success.
interpretation.romance: Someone special finally notices your true worth.
interpretation.health: Underlying strength emerges, vitality improves dramatically.

fortunes.verse:
Each season brings its perfect grace.
Beauty appears at its proper place.
Timing is the key to all success.
In harmony, find your happiness.

interpretation.general: Everything unfolds at the perfect time, remain patient.
interpretation.business: Seasonal business cycles work in your favor naturally.
interpretation.romance: Right person appears at exactly the right moment.
interpretation.health: Body's natural rhythms promote excellent health.

fortunes.title_english: Clouds Part to Reveal the Sun
fortunes.verse:
Confusion clears like morning mist.
The path ahead cannot be missed.
Obstacles dissolve in clarity's light.
Everything becomes perfectly bright.

interpretation.general: Confusion ends, clarity brings swift progress forward.
interpretation.business: Market conditions clear, excellent time to act decisively.
interpretation.romance: Misunderstandings resolved, truth strengthens the bond.
interpretation.health: Diagnosis found, effective treatment now possible.

fortunes.verse:
Loyal friends unite in sacred vow.
Together facing what life will allow.
True partnership brings strength times three.
In unity lies victory.

interpretation.general: Strong alliances and partnerships bring mutual success.
interpretation.business: Partnership or team effort multiplies results significantly.
interpretation.romance: Deep friendship evolves into lasting commitment.
interpretation.health: Support network aids recovery and wellness.

fortunes.verse:
Simple wisdom in nature's embrace.
Two humble men discuss life's pace.
Detachment from worldly strife.
Brings contentment to simple life.

interpretation.general: Simplicity and contentment bring more happiness than ambition.
interpretation.business: Modest steady income beats risky ventures now.
interpretation.romance: Simple genuine connection outweighs passionate intensity.
interpretation.health: Natural lifestyle and stress reduction promote wellness.

fortunes.title_english: Old Man Under Moon Ties Red Thread
fortunes.verse:
Destined connections made in heaven.
Red thread of fate cannot be severed.
True love arrives through divine design.
Soulmates meet and stars align.

interpretation.general: Destined relationships and connections manifest powerfully.
interpretation.business: Perfect partnership or client relationship forms naturally.
interpretation.romance: Fated meeting with soulmate or life partner occurs.
interpretation.health: Find the perfect doctor or healer for your condition.

fortunes.verse:
Through destruction comes rebirth complete.
From ashes rising, never face defeat.
Stronger, wiser, blazing bright.
Transformation brings eternal light.

interpretation.general: Complete transformation after crisis brings unprecedented success.
interpretation.business: Business restructuring leads to remarkable prosperity.
interpretation.romance: Relationship renewed or new love after painful ending.
interpretation.health: Full recovery and transformation to better health than before.

fortunes.verse:
Final touch brings work to life.
Perfect detail cuts like knife.
Small addition makes great difference.
Excellence achieved through diligence.

interpretation.general: One final effort or detail brings complete success.
interpretation.business: Last crucial element makes venture extremely successful.
interpretation.romance: Small gesture or commitment completes perfect relationship.
interpretation.health: Final treatment or change brings full recovery.

fortunes.verse:
Sailing forward with wind behind.
Obstacles broken, new lands to find.
Courage and skill navigate the way.
Great adventure begins today.

interpretation.general: Bold action with confidence leads to exciting success.
interpretation.business: Expansion into new markets brings excellent returns.
interpretation.romance: Adventurous approach to love brings thrilling connection.
interpretation.health: Active lifestyle and adventure boost vitality.

fortunes.title_english: Hall Filled with Gold and Jade
fortunes.verse:
Wealth and treasure overflow.
Abundance everywhere you go.
Material and spiritual riches combine.
Every aspect of life will shine.

interpretation.general: Complete prosperity in all areas of life simultaneously.
interpretation.business: Exceptional financial success and growth in all ventures.
interpretation.romance: Relationship brings both joy and material stability.
interpretation.health: Excellent health combined with resources for best care.

fortunes.title_english: Keeping Watch Until Clouds Clear and Moon Appears
fortunes.verse:
Patient vigil through darkest night.
Faith maintained without clear sight.
Persistence through uncertainty's test.
Eventually brings deserved rest.

interpretation.general: Patience during unclear times eventually brings clarity and success.
interpretation.business: Long-term strategy requires continued faith and patience.
interpretation.romance: Relationship uncertain now but patience brings clarity.
interpretation.health: Unclear diagnosis requires patience for proper treatment.

fortunes.verse:
Harmony reigns in every direction.
Peace achieved through wise reflection.
Conflicts resolved on every shore.
Tranquility valued more and more.

interpretation.general: Universal harmony in all relationships and endeavors.
interpretation.business: Smooth operations, good relations with all partners.
interpretation.romance: Complete harmony and understanding with partner.
interpretation.health: All body systems balanced and functioning harmoniously.

fortunes.title_english: Three Visits to the Thatched Cottage
fortunes.verse:
Humble persistence wins respect.
Sincere effort has great effect.
Those who truly show they care.
Win loyalty beyond compare.

interpretation.general: Sincere persistent effort wins respect and cooperation.
interpretation.business: Patience in negotiations brings valuable partnerships.
interpretation.romance: Genuine courtship and respect win heart of beloved.
interpretation.health: Persistent search finds the right healthcare provider.

fortunes.verse:
Hidden beauty, fragrance pure.
In isolation, virtues endure.
Though unseen by many eyes.
True worth needs no disguise.

interpretation.general: Your worth exists regardless of recognition, maintain integrity.
interpretation.business: Quality work will eventually attract right audience.
interpretation.romance: True character attracts genuine partner when ready.
interpretation.health: Inner health more important than outer appearance.

fortunes.verse:
Good fortune compounds with more delight.
Success building upon success so bright.
One blessing follows another near.
Prosperous momentum throughout the year.

interpretation.general: Success builds upon success, momentum accelerates.
interpretation.business: Profitable ventures lead to more opportunities.
interpretation.romance: Happy relationship continues to deepen and improve.
interpretation.health: Good health improves to excellent condition.

fortunes.verse:
Help arrives when needed most.
True friends appear on frozen coast.
Kindness shown in desperate hour.
Reveals genuine love and power.

interpretation.general: Timely assistance comes exactly when most needed.
interpretation.business: Crucial support or investment arrives at critical moment.
interpretation.romance: Partner proves loyalty during difficult times.
interpretation.health: Effective help or treatment found at crucial time.

fortunes.verse:
Luck descends like heavenly grace.
Forward motion in every space.
Opportunities abound at every turn.
Success and recognition you'll earn.

interpretation.general: Peak fortune period, everything succeeds effortlessly.
interpretation.business: Every venture succeeds, profits exceed expectations.
interpretation.romance: Perfect timing for commitment or deepening relationship.
interpretation.health: Peak vitality, excellent time for health improvements.

fortunes.verse:
Each step forward climbs higher still.
Steady progress through determined will.
Promotion follows promotion clear.
Career ascends throughout the year.

interpretation.general: Steady continuous advancement in all endeavors.
interpretation.business: Consistent growth and expansion, each phase successful.
interpretation.romance: Relationship progresses naturally through stages.
interpretation.health: Gradual continuous improvement in all health markers.

fortunes.verse:
What was shattered can be mended.
Separation can be ended.
Reconciliation heals the pain.
Broken bonds restored again.

interpretation.general: Broken relationships or situations can be repaired.
interpretation.business: Failed ventures can be revived with new approach.
interpretation.romance: Separated lovers reunite, past hurts can heal.
interpretation.health: Recovery possible even from serious damage.

fortunes.verse:
Swift as galloping steed's advance.
Victory comes at first glance.
Effortless achievement of your goal.
Rapid success makes you whole.

interpretation.general: Quick easy success without significant obstacles.
interpretation.business: Fast profitable results from new initiatives.
interpretation.romance: Relationship progresses quickly to commitment.
interpretation.health: Rapid recovery or immediate improvement.

fortunes.verse:
Heaven arranges perfect pair.
Beyond all human plan and care.
Destined union blessed from above.
Eternal happiness in true love.

interpretation.general: Perfect partnerships or connections arranged by fate.
interpretation.business: Ideal business partner or opportunity appears divinely.
interpretation.romance: Perfect soulmate connection, marriage highly favored.
interpretation.health: Find ideal healthcare provider or healing method.

fortunes.title_english: Pushing Clouds to See the Sun
fortunes.verse:
Active effort clears the way.
Confusion dispersed by light of day.
Take initiative to make things clear.
Brightness replaces atmosphere of fear.

interpretation.general: Taking action brings clarity and removes obstacles.
interpretation.business: Proactive problem-solving clears path to success.
interpretation.romance: Clear communication resolves misunderstandings.
interpretation.health: Seeking answers leads to diagnosis and treatment.

fortunes.verse:
After winter's cold and gloom.
Spring arrives with flowers in bloom.
Renewal in every living thing.
New beginning that the seasons bring.

interpretation.general: Period of renewal and fresh starts in all areas.
interpretation.business: Market recovery, new energy in stagnant ventures.
interpretation.romance: New love or renewed passion in existing relationship.
interpretation.health: Energy returns, vitality restored fully.

fortunes.verse:
Wealth and honor both attained.
Every blessing fully gained.
Material and social success combine.
In every way, your stars align.

interpretation.general: Complete success in both material wealth and social standing.
interpretation.business: Financial success brings respect and influence.
interpretation.romance: Partner brings both love and improved social status.
interpretation.health: Wellness brings both vitality and improved life quality.

fortunes.verse:
Greedy hands reach out to take.
Every opportunity for own sake.
Excessive taking brings future loss.
Short-term gain at long-term cost.

interpretation.general: Excessive greed leads to eventual loss, practice moderation.
interpretation.business: Taking too much profit now damages future prospects.
interpretation.romance: Demanding too much pushes partner away.
interpretation.health: Overindulgence damages health, require restraint.

fortunes.verse:
Dragon returns to proper realm.
Power and freedom overwhelm.
In right environment, talents soar.
Achieve what was impossible before.

interpretation.general: Finding the right environment unleashes your full potential.
interpretation.business: Right market or location brings explosive growth.
interpretation.romance: Meeting right person in right circumstances.
interpretation.health: Right treatment or environment brings complete recovery.

fortunes.verse:
Natural timing brings completion.
No force needed for fruition.
When truly ready, results appear.
Success comes when time is near.

interpretation.general: Natural timing brings effortless success, don't force.
interpretation.business: Venture succeeds when fully developed, be patient.
interpretation.romance: Relationship commitment comes naturally when ready.
interpretation.health: Healing occurs at body's natural pace.

fortunes.verse:
Perfect conditions for growth appear.
Every element cooperates here.
Nature's blessing on your endeavor.
Success sustained through fair weather.

interpretation.general: Ideal conditions for all undertakings, excellent timing.
interpretation.business: Market conditions perfect for launching ventures.
interpretation.romance: Everything aligns favorably for relationship.
interpretation.health: Optimal conditions for healing and wellness.

fortunes.verse:
Your excellence cannot be hidden.
Among the ordinary, you're distinguished.
Natural superiority shines bright.
Recognition comes to light.

interpretation.general: Your exceptional qualities ensure recognition and elevation.
interpretation.business: Superior product or service dominates market.
interpretation.romance: You stand out attractively to discerning people.
interpretation.health: Superior health and vitality compared to peers.

fortunes.verse:
Journey proceeds without delay.
Wind and current show the way.
No obstacles block your path ahead.
Success assured as you are led.

interpretation.general: Everything proceeds smoothly without complications.
interpretation.business: Projects complete ahead of schedule and under budget.
interpretation.romance: Relationship flows naturally without conflict.
interpretation.health: Treatment effective with no complications.

fortunes.verse:
Humble origin transcended far.
From lowly state to brightest star.
Complete transformation elevates.
Destiny to greatness awaits.

interpretation.general: Dramatic elevation in status and circumstances.
interpretation.business: Small venture becomes major success story.
interpretation.romance: Ordinary relationship becomes extraordinary union.
interpretation.health: Complete transformation to superior health state.

fortunes.verse:
Through the darkest path you roam.
Suddenly arrive at blooming home.
Just when hope seems nearly lost.
Discovery worth all previous cost.

interpretation.general: Breakthrough comes after period of difficulty.
interpretation.business: Solution appears just when giving up seemed likely.
interpretation.romance: Love found unexpectedly after disappointments.
interpretation.health: Recovery happens after most difficult phase.

fortunes.verse:
While others fight, you profit well.
No participation, but you excel.
Neutral position brings advantage clear.
Benefits come without strife or fear.

interpretation.general: Remaining neutral brings unexpected advantages.
interpretation.business: Avoid competition wars, focus on opportunities they create.
interpretation.romance: Don't compete for attention, attract naturally.
interpretation.health: Avoid stress of conflict, maintain peaceful state.

fortunes.verse:
After endless days of thirst.
Raindrops fall to quench the worst.
What was dying springs to life.
Relief from prolonged strife.

interpretation.general: Long-awaited relief and renewal finally arrive.
interpretation.business: Cash flow or resources appear after difficult period.
interpretation.romance: Love arrives after long period alone.
interpretation.health: Effective treatment found after long search.

fortunes.verse:
Peak of happiness holds hidden risk.
Extreme joy can change swift and brisk.
Moderation keeps fortune secure.
Excess celebration cannot endure.

interpretation.general: Excessive celebration or confidence leads to problems.
interpretation.business: Overconfidence in success causes careless mistakes.
interpretation.romance: Taking relationship for granted causes problems.
interpretation.health: Overindulgence undoes health progress.

fortunes.verse:
Experience guides without a map.
Wisdom fills every gap.
Seasoned judgment leads you right.
Knowledge accumulated brings insight.

interpretation.general: Past experience provides valuable guidance now.
interpretation.business: Your expertise gives competitive advantage.
interpretation.romance: Mature wisdom helps navigate relationship.
interpretation.health: Past health knowledge guides current decisions.

fortunes.verse:
Distance cannot sever fate's design.
Invisible thread makes souls combine.
No matter how far apart you start.
Destiny brings union of heart.

interpretation.general: Destined connections overcome any obstacle or distance.
interpretation.business: Important partnership forms despite geographical separation.
interpretation.romance: Fated relationship transcends all barriers.
interpretation.health: Right healer or treatment found regardless of location.

fortunes.verse:
Step by step, foundation strong.
Rushing ahead would be wrong.
Solid progress without flash.
Stable growth prevents crash.

interpretation.general: Steady methodical approach brings reliable results.
interpretation.business: Conservative strategy ensures sustainable growth.
interpretation.romance: Relationship builds on solid foundation.
interpretation.health: Gradual lifestyle changes create lasting health.

fortunes.verse:
Diversity creates splendid scene.
Every color in between.
Multiple paths all lead to success.
Abundance in variety, no less.

interpretation.general: Multiple opportunities and options all favorable.
interpretation.business: Diversification strategy brings success in all areas.
interpretation.romance: Many potential partners or relationship aspects thrive.
interpretation.health: Multiple approaches to wellness all prove beneficial.

fortunes.verse:
Your word carries tremendous weight.
Integrity determines fate.
Trust earned through promises kept.
Reputation carefully perfect.

interpretation.general: Your integrity and reliability bring opportunities.
interpretation.business: Reputation for reliability attracts valuable clients.
interpretation.romance: Trust and commitment strengthen relationship.
interpretation.health: Following through on health commitments brings results.

fortunes.verse:
Good news travels on bamboo stalks.
Peace and safety in all walks.
Messages of joy arrive soon.
Good fortune comes like harvest moon.

interpretation.general: Positive news and peaceful times ahead.
interpretation.business: Good reports and favorable market news.
interpretation.romance: Communication brings reassurance and happiness.
interpretation.health: Test results positive, concerns alleviated.

fortunes.verse:
Imagination cannot feed the soul.
Wishful thinking cannot make you whole.
Action needed, not just dreams.
Reality requires more than schemes.

interpretation.general: Dreams alone insufficient, action required.
interpretation.business: Planning phase over, implementation necessary now.
interpretation.romance: Fantasizing about love not enough, pursue actively.
interpretation.health: Positive thinking must combine with actual treatment.

fortunes.title_english: Flowers Bloom Bringing Wealth and Honor
fortunes.verse:
Blossoms herald prosperous days.
Success arrives in countless ways.
Wealth and status both increase.
Happiness and joy will never cease.

interpretation.general: Complete prosperity and honor in all aspects.
interpretation.business: Business flourishes bringing wealth and recognition.
interpretation.romance: Relationship brings joy and elevated social position.
interpretation.health: Blooming health brings vitality and happiness.

fortunes.title_english: Great Vessel Takes Time to Complete
fortunes.verse:
Finest works require patient years.
Maturity arrives when time appears.
Late success more solid stands.
Wealth built by seasoned hands.

interpretation.general: Success comes later but proves more lasting.
interpretation.business: Delayed success will be more substantial.
interpretation.romance: Mature love more meaningful than youthful passion.
interpretation.health: Long-term wellness program pays off eventually.

fortunes.title_english: Purple Qi Comes from the East
fortunes.verse:
Auspicious energy approaches near.
Sage wisdom's presence here.
Divine blessing from ancient source.
Highest fortune sets new course.

interpretation.general: Extremely auspicious period with spiritual blessing.
interpretation.business: Unprecedented opportunity brings transformative success.
interpretation.romance: Sacred connection with deep spiritual dimension.
interpretation.health: Spiritual healing brings complete wellness.

fortunes.verse:
Warm light reaches every corner.
Blessings touch each performer.
Universal good fortune spreads.
Success in all endeavor threads.

interpretation.general: Widespread good fortune affects all life areas.
interpretation.business: All departments and projects succeed simultaneously.
interpretation.romance: All aspects of relationship harmonious and bright.
interpretation.health: Overall wellness in all body systems.

fortunes.verse:
Perfect fit in environment found.
In natural element, you're unbound.
Everything flows with graceful ease.
Comfort and success come to please.

interpretation.general: Perfect alignment with circumstances brings natural success.
interpretation.business: Ideal market conditions for your particular strengths.
interpretation.romance: Perfect compatibility with partner.
interpretation.health: Lifestyle perfectly suited to your constitution.

fortunes.verse:
Abundant harvest fills the stores.
Prosperity through every door.
Hard work rewarded richly now.
Wealth accumulated by your plow.

interpretation.general: Hard work brings abundant material rewards.
interpretation.business: Investments and efforts yield excellent returns.
interpretation.romance: Relationship efforts produce deep satisfaction.
interpretation.health: Health investments pay off in vitality.

fortunes.verse:
Double six brings fortune's favor.
Every endeavor to savor.
Smooth success in all you do.
Perfect harmony sees you through.

interpretation.general: Maximum auspiciousness, everything proceeds perfectly.
interpretation.business: All ventures succeed with unusual ease.
interpretation.romance: Perfect harmony and progress in relationship.
interpretation.health: Optimal health and all systems functioning ideally.

fortunes.verse:
Important person lends their hand.
Your success they help to stand.
Influential aid appears.
Overcome your doubts and fears.

interpretation.general: Influential person provides crucial assistance.
interpretation.business: Powerful mentor or investor supports your venture.
interpretation.romance: Important person introduces you to ideal partner.
interpretation.health: Excellent doctor or healer provides care.

fortunes.verse:
Rising high with effortless grace.
Rapid ascent to lofty place.
No obstacles block your way.
Success increases every day.

interpretation.general: Rapid advancement without significant obstacles.
interpretation.business: Quick rise to industry leadership position.
interpretation.romance: Relationship elevates social status significantly.
interpretation.health: Rapid improvement to excellent health.

fortunes.verse:
Whatever you desire comes true.
Universe conspires to help you.
Thoughts manifest with perfect timing.
Every wish needs no refining.

interpretation.general: Manifestation power extremely strong, desires realized.
interpretation.business: Business goals achieved exactly as envisioned.
interpretation.romance: Ideal relationship manifests as hoped.
interpretation.health: Health goals achieved through positive focus.

fortunes.verse:
Perfect pairing creates masterpiece.
Two excellences together increase.
Combination greater than parts alone.
Unity makes brilliance known.

interpretation.general: Perfect partnerships create synergy and excellence.
interpretation.business: Business merger or partnership exceptionally successful.
interpretation.romance: Perfect match, marriage highly auspicious.
interpretation.health: Treatment combination produces excellent results.

fortunes.verse:
Everything proceeds as you desire.
No aspect fails to lift higher.
Complete fulfillment in every way.
Perfect satisfaction every day.

interpretation.general: Complete fulfillment in all aspects of life.
interpretation.business: All business objectives achieved perfectly.
interpretation.romance: Relationship exceeds all expectations.
interpretation.health: Perfect health and vitality achieved.

fortunes.verse:
Resources appear wherever you turn.
Support is constant, easy to earn.
No matter which path you take.
Success follows for your sake.

interpretation.general: Abundant resources and support from all directions.
interpretation.business: Multiple revenue streams all profitable.
interpretation.romance: Support from all quarters for relationship.
interpretation.health: All health resources readily available.

fortunes.verse:
Wealth arrives from every source.
Financial success stays on course.
Money matters resolve with ease.
Prosperity grows as you please.

interpretation.general: Excellent financial fortune from multiple sources.
interpretation.business: High profitability and cash flow from all operations.
interpretation.romance: Partner contributes to financial stability.
interpretation.health: Financial resources available for health needs.

fortunes.verse:
When home is peaceful, all else thrives.
Harmony sustains successful lives.
Family unity creates strong base.
From which success finds its place.

interpretation.general: Domestic harmony creates foundation for overall success.
interpretation.business: Stable home life supports business growth.
interpretation.romance: Family approval and support strengthen relationship.
interpretation.health: Peaceful home environment promotes wellness.

fortunes.verse:
